name: Shopping Panic
description:
Don't drop any groceries!

Your son needs you to buy a few things and in the panic you forget a basket. You now need to make sure not to drop anything as you are put into this hectic yet mundane situation.

This game might not be playable because of keyboard limitations. It was made as a fun little project.

We made this!

This game is a student project made for the Intro to Unreal Blueprinting at Futuregames Higher Vocational Educations in Stockholm, Sweden. It was made in march 2020 using Unreal Engine 4 during 1 week. Created by Mattias "Mau" Lundell, Erik Martinsson and Marcus "Spinn" Bildtgård.
